DOC.brief_title: Changes Grip Strength Using Bandage Kinesio Taping
DOC.detailed_description: A sample 45 subject divide randomly three group ( G1 : muscle activation technique ; G2 : muscle inhibition technique ; G3 : Placebo Effect ) age 18 year male female , initially measure strength grip dynamometer Jamar® pressure . Then Kinesio Taping® bandage apply `` I '' format wrist flexor muscle dominant non-dominant limb G1 , G2 , G3 group . Investigators follow application protocol suggest method technical . To provide facilitation muscle activity ( G1 group ) Kinesio Taping® bandage apply muscle start origin location muscle insertion . For inhibition muscle activity ( G2 group ) , bandage place muscle start insertion location end muscle origin . For control group ( G3 group ) bandage place lateral extremity medial axis . The measurement grip strength carry four stage : immediately place Kinesio Taping® , 24 h , 48 h , 72 h application . After collect data statistical Investigators hold analysis data .
